speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: SCENE VI. Another room in the Garter Inn.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text_entry: Enter FENTON and Host

speaker: Host
text_entry: Master Fenton, talk not to me; my mind is heavy: I

speaker: Host
text_entry: will give over all.

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: Yet hear me speak. Assist me in my purpose,

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: And, as I am a gentleman, I'll give thee

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: A hundred pound in gold more than your loss.

speaker: Host
text_entry: I will hear you, Master Fenton; and I will at the

speaker: Host
text_entry: least keep your counsel.

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: From time to time I have acquainted you

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: With the dear love I bear to fair Anne Page;

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: Who mutually hath answer'd my affection,

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: So far forth as herself might be her chooser,

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: Even to my wish: I have a letter from her

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: Of such contents as you will wonder at;

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: The mirth whereof so larded with my matter,

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: That neither singly can be manifested,

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: Without the show of both; fat Falstaff

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: Hath a great scene: the image of the jest

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: I'll show you here at large. Hark, good mine host.

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: To-night at Herne's oak, just 'twixt twelve and one,

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: Must my sweet Nan present the Fairy Queen;

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: The purpose why, is here: in which disguise,

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: While other jests are something rank on foot,

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: Her father hath commanded her to slip

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: Away with Slender and with him at Eton

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: Immediately to marry: she hath consented: Now, sir,

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: Her mother, ever strong against that match

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: And firm for Doctor Caius, hath appointed

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: That he shall likewise shuffle her away,

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: While other sports are tasking of their minds,

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: And at the deanery, where a priest attends,

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: Straight marry her: to this her mother's plot

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: She seemingly obedient likewise hath

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: Made promise to the doctor. Now, thus it rests:

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: Her father means she shall be all in white,

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: And in that habit, when Slender sees his time

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: To take her by the hand and bid her go,

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: She shall go with him: her mother hath intended,

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: The better to denote her to the doctor,

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: For they must all be mask'd and vizarded,

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: That quaint in green she shall be loose enrobed,

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: With ribands pendent, flaring 'bout her head;

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: And when the doctor spies his vantage ripe,

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: To pinch her by the hand, and, on that token,

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: The maid hath given consent to go with him.

speaker: Host
text_entry: Which means she to deceive, father or mother?

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: Both, my good host, to go along with me:

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: And here it rests, that you'll procure the vicar

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: To stay for me at church 'twixt twelve and one,

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: And, in the lawful name of marrying,

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: To give our hearts united ceremony.

speaker: Host
text_entry: Well, husband your device; I'll to the vicar:

speaker: Host
text_entry: Bring you the maid, you shall not lack a priest.

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: So shall I evermore be bound to thee;

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: Besides, I'll make a present recompense.

speaker: FENTON
text_entry: Exeunt
